title: DRAFT Data in Animal Welfare
text:
Preface
This is a free book on data in animal welfare

title: 1  Introduction to Data in Animal Welfare
text:
This is an open resource to support people to use data in animal welfare
Five domains (Mellor et al. 2020)




Mellor, David J., Ngaio J. Beausoleil, Katherine E. Littlewood, Andrew N. McLean, Paul D. McGreevy, Bidda Jones, and Cristina Wilkins. 2020. “The 2020 five domains model: Including human–animal interactions in assessments of animal welfare.” Animals 10 (10): 1–24. https://doi.org/10.3390/ani10101870.

title: 2  Data Types
text:
NOIR data
Collecting data from animals

title: 4  Summary
text: In summary, this book has no content whatsoever.
